mapper.insert: insert into t_schedule (schedule_code, screen_code, branch_code, room_code, schedule_date, schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time, schedule_empty_seat) values ('SH' || lpad(T_SCHEDULE_SEQ.nextval, 6,0), #{screenCode}, #{branchCode}, #{roomCode}, #{scheduleDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{emptySeat})
mapper.update: update t_schedule set screen_code = #{screenCode}, branch_code = #{branchCode}, room_code = #{roomCode}, schedule_date = #{scheduleDate}, schedule_start_time = #{startTime}, schedule_end_time = #{endTime}, schedule_empty_seat = #{emptySeat} where schedule_code = #{code}
mapper.select: select * from t_schedule order by schedule_code desc
